mapper.insert: insert into board (no, writer, title, content, createDate) values (board_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
insert into upload_file (file_id, file_name, file_data, no) values (#{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{fileData}, board_seq.currval)
mapper.select: select file_id as fileId, file_name as fileName from upload_file where no = #{no}
select file_name as fileName, file_data as fileData from upload_file where file_id = #{fileId}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where no = #{no}
